description: Decimal expansion of fine-structure constant alpha.
comments: Warning: the estimate is continually changing.
references: John Barrow, The Constants of Nature, 367pp, Jonathan Cape, 2002.
H. J. Fischbeck and K. Fischbeck, Formulas. Facts and Constants, Springer-Verlag, NY, 2nd ed., 1987.
K. R. Lang, Astrophysical Data: Planets and Stars, Springer-Verlag, NY, 1991.
Martin J. Rees. Just Six Numbers: the deep forces that shape the universe. Phoenix. 1999
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Hans de Vries, An exact formula for the Electro Magnetic coupling constant (fine structure constant), 2004.
mathematica: (* Conjectural computation using Hans de Vries' formula *) alpha[n_] := alpha[n] = a /. FindRoot[a == Fold[1 + a/(2*Pi)^#2*#1&, 0, Range[n, 0, -1]]^2*Exp[-Pi^2/2], {a, Exp[-Pi^2/2]}]; alpha[5]; alpha[n = 10]; While[RealDigits[alpha[n]] != RealDigits[alpha[n-5]], n = n+5]; Join[{0, 0}, RealDigits[alpha[n]] // First] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Aug 05 2014 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Mira Bernstein_
extensions: Updated by _Omar E. Pol_, Aug 09 2009, _R. J. Mathar_, Dec 15 2012
Edited definition. - _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 11 2016
